description: Provides comprehensive guidance on Cho Oyu preparation including training protocols, gear recommendations, acclimatization schedules, medical considerations, route information, and logistics planning. Adapts advice based on user's climbing experience and timeline.

result.category: The main category of guidance: training, gear, acclimatization, medical, route, logistics, or general
result.experience_level: Detected or assumed experience level: beginner, intermediate, or advanced
result.guidance: Comprehensive advice with structured sections and detailed information
result.timeline_considerations: Timeline-specific advice if preparation duration was mentioned
